thread.section_title: Livewire Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Livewire | www.getlivewire.com
thread.title: John Josefiak

author: John Josefiak
title: John Josefiak
text: Had excellent experience from start to finish. Livewire personnel are professional, punctual and highly knowledgeable on residential networking, audio/video/security wiring and systems. I appreciate the professional work performed by Greg and Dustin. This required installing new and moving multi-gang network/audio/video boxes (to/from closets and above-fireplace). Also, thier explaination and tutorials on the systems they activated were clear and helpful.
